availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, resident. Ohio native. Married to Sarah Jane Middaugh Davis on December 20, 1860. Father of Mary E. Davis.

ab.bibl: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Precinct 2, p. 14. Jordan Dodd, comp., Kentucky Marriages, 1851-1900, Greenup County, 1860. Find A Grave, "Joseph Davis (1838-1907)," Memorial #149047902, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/149047902/joseph-davis (accessed June 15, 2017). KYR-0001-029-0583.
